briefTitle: Clinical Study of the CardioFocus Endoscopic Ablation System for the Treatment of Symptomatic AF

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Symptomatic, Paroxysmal atrial fibrillation (AF)
* 18 to 70 years of age
* Failure of at least one AAD
* Others

Exclusion Criteria:

* Generally good overall health as determined by multiple criteria
* Willing to participate in a study
* Others

outcomeMeasures.title: Chronic Effectiveness in Treating PAF as Demonstrated by no AF Recurrences After the Blanking Period and During the 12-month Follow-up Period.
